name: Hello Goodboy
storyline:
Arriving in the afterlife with no memory, a kid trying to unravel the mysteries and mend mistakes from the forgotten past life, accompanied by a good boy doggo.

Meet Iko, a lost soul who just arrived in the afterlife with no memory intact.
In the confusion state, Coco, a mysterious dog appears to help and guide Iko to start the adventure in this place called Kuruto.
Without knowing what will come at the end, Iko reassures to continue and unravel the mysteries ahead.

Iko and Coco's journey will be full of choices. Choosing one will bring consequences and leave the unknown behind.
Iko should always follow what the heart says, and Coco will always be there by the side.
With Magic Hourglass and Magic Toolbox has given, Iko will meet and befriend various denizens in the afterlife.
Listening to their unique story, and helping them deal with problems, will give Iko a meaningful purpose as the glimpse of past memory reappears.

Good and bad things might be happening in this adventure. But worry not, Coco will always be there for Iko.
Spend the time well, enjoy the adventure together, and don't forget to give Coco a ton of hugs and belly rubs.

Hello Goodboy features:

• Wholesome experience. Heartwarming and meaningful stories in all parts of the game

• Series of meaningful choices. Every choice is different and will alter the ending. Multiple endings await

• Beautiful art and music. Fully hand-drawn art and heartful crafted music will soothe the eyes and ears while the story does the magic to the heart

• Coco, the good boy! The best friend ever. And yes, you can interact with the dog such as hug it and give a belly rub.
summary:
Hello Goodboy is a wholesome, heartwarming, and cozy non-linear narrative game about adventure in the afterlife together with a dog.

Iko, a kid new to the afterlife with no memory of what brought him to the world beyond, Iko must rely on Coco, a strangely familiar dog who will help Iko solve the mysteries of this new existence.

Hello Goodboy features a wholesome experience, a series of meaningful choices, beautiful art and music, and a hugable dog!
